scripts.deploy-dev: echo"Start building" && npm run build && echo "Start deploing on dev s3" && cd ./app && aws s3 sync build/ s3://intacs-staging --acl public-read && echo "Deploy dev ended"
scripts.deploy-prod: echo"Start building" && npm run build && echo "Start deploing on prod s3" && cd ./app && aws s3 sync build/ s3://intacs-prod --acl public-read && echo "Deploy prod ended"
